dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Is Apple Inc. (AAPL) the Best Dow Stock to Buy Right Now?
News Content: We recently published a list of 12 Best Dow Stocks to Buy Right Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) stands against other best Dow stocks to buy right now.

The Dow Jones Industrial Average is among the most popular stock market indices globally. Known as the Dow, the index monitors the performance of 30 blue-chip companies listed on the US stock exchanges. In 2024, the Dow index returned over 16%, compared to a 25% return for the broader market.

Historically, the Dow has performed better compared to the broader market. According to S&P Global, in the past 30 years up until June 2021, the Dow index returned approximately 11.16% compared to the market’s return of 10.6%. This growth is mainly due to the Dow’s stable, industry-leading companies that offer reliable dividends and returns.

READ ALSO: 7 Most Undervalued Financial Stocks To Buy According to Analysts.

Since the beginning of 2025, Dow Jones has soared over 4% as mega-cap tech stocks surged following their positive earnings. Whereas, the S&P 500 index has jumped by 3.70% year-to-date, as of January 23.

Trump’s AI startup initiative is already pumping the tech stocks. The $500 billion Stargate AI infrastructure project led by Oracle, OpenAI, and SoftBank will accelerate the AI demand. Tech stocks are already dominating the market driven by the huge demand for AI. Nasdaq Composite returned nearly 30% in 2024, outperforming the Dow and the S&P 500.

The U.S. economy is expected to perform better this year compared to 2024 followed by lower interest rates and PCE inflation expected around 2.1%. Economists anticipate a suitable atmosphere for mergers and acquisitions.

Investing in Dow Jones stocks can be appealing in 2025 as they offer huge dividends and returns. The Dow stocks have strong balance sheets and have a proven track record of high yields.

Our Methodology

We shifted through the Dow Jones Index and selected the 12 best Dow stocks based on hedge fund sentiment around each stock using Insider Monkey’s data for Q3 2024. The best Dow stocks are ranked in ascending order of their hedge fund holdings.

Why do we care about what hedge funds do? The reason is simple: our research has shown that we can outperform the market by imitating the top stock picks of the best hedge funds. Our quarterly newsletter’s strategy selects 14 small-cap and large-cap stocks every quarter and has returned 275% since May 2014, beating its benchmark by 150 percentage points (see more details here).Is Apple Inc. (AAPL) the Best Dow Stocks to Buy Right Now?

A wide view of an Apple store, showing the range of products the company offers.

Story Continues

Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)

No. of Hedge Fund Holders: 158

Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is a technology company that designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, PCs, watches, wearables, and related accessories. Over the past years, the iPhone maker has enhanced its Services business segment with major products including Apple Wallet and Apple Pay, which allows users to manage payments from their Apple systems.

Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has solidified its long-term dominance in the consumer electronics sector while concentrating on a high-end, intricately linked ecosystem of goods, services, and software. Apple’s iPhone which generates 46% of the company’s net sales continues to hold its market. Retaining consumers in this interlinked ecosystem of Apple allows the company to expand its network and maximize its earnings.

In the fourth quarter of 2024, the company reported record revenue of $94.9 billion, a rise of 6% from a year ago. The sales growth was driven by strong iPhone revenue, which accounted for $46.2 billion, setting a record for the September quarter across all geographic areas. Apple’s services sector continues to grow as the firm reported over 1 billion paid memberships in Q4. The services revenue also reached a record high of $25 billion, up 12% year-over-year.

CDT Capital Management stated the following regarding Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) in its Q4 2024 investor letter:

“The crowd. While this evolution in AI is going to change the world, market expectations for the technology have become unhinged. The crowd, which is more like an exuberant mob, anointed the Mag 7 with spectacular, nonsensical valuations based on the premise that AI will be an amazing, money-printing growth engine for these companies – and the truth is it likely will be. The problem is that the math just isn’t mathing.”

Overall, AAPL ranks 5th on our list of best Dow stocks to buy right now. While we acknowledge the potential of AAPL to grow, our conviction lies in the belief that AI stocks hold greater promise for delivering higher returns and doing so within a shorter time frame. If you are looking for an AI stock that is more promising than AAPL but that trades at less than 5 times its earnings, check out our report about the cheapest AI stock.

READ NEXT: 20 Best AI Stocks To Buy Now and Complete List of 59 AI Companies Under $2 Billion in Market Cap

Disclosure: None. This article is originally published at Insider Monkey.

View Comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.75, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.25, Reasoning: The article presents a positive outlook on Apple Inc. (AAPL), highlighting its strong performance in the fourth quarter with record revenues largely driven by iPhone sales and growth in its services segment. Additionally, AAPL ranks among the best Dow stocks according to hedge fund sentiment, which can positively influence investor perception. While the overall market sentiment is skewed towards AI stocks, the growth in AAPL's infrastructure and robust sales figures suggest that it's a solid investment within the Dow. Therefore, there is a higher likelihood of the stock price rising as the favorable news may attract buying interest.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45, Reasoning: The article presents a mixed outlook for Apple (AAPL). On the positive side, it highlights Apple's strong performance, including revenue growth, especially in iPhones and services, exceeding 1 billion paid memberships. It also mentions Apple's dominance in the consumer electronics sector and its increasing demand in AI, which is generally positive for tech stocks which can drive demand for AAPL's products. Apple is also a leading player in wearable tech. Hedge fund interest in Apple is significant, further suggesting market confidence. On the other hand, the article suggests other AI stocks might offer higher returns compared to Apple in the immediate future. Furthermore, the article positions Apple at number 5 on the list of the best Dow stocks to buy, implying other stocks may have greater growth potential. While the article does not contain explicitly negative information, the comparison to AI Stocks and ranking could reduce positive sentiment. Therefore, I believe there's a slightly higher probability of a rise in stock price given all the information but not by a wide margin.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2, Reasoning: The news article presents a mixed outlook for Apple. While Apple reported record revenue and strong growth in its services sector, the article emphasizes the potential of AI stocks to outperform Apple in the shorter term.  The article ranks Apple 5th out of 12 best Dow stocks to buy now based on hedge fund sentiment, suggesting a positive, but not overwhelmingly bullish, outlook.  The mention of CDT Capital Management's cautious view on the overvaluation of AI stocks, even while acknowledging their potential, introduces a note of uncertainty. Overall, the article highlights Apple's strong performance but doesn't provide compelling reasons for an immediate significant price surge.  The probability of a price rise is therefore tempered by the comparison to other, higher-ranked, AI stocks.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3, Reasoning: The news article highlights Apple Inc.'s strong performance, including record revenue in Q4 2024, driven by iPhone sales and growth in its services segment. The company's solid position in the Dow Jones Industrial Average, coupled with positive market trends in tech stocks due to AI advancements and overall economic optimism, suggests a favorable outlook. However, the article also mentions concerns about 'unhinged' valuations in the tech sector, which could introduce some volatility. Despite this, the overall sentiment appears positive, with AAPL being ranked among the best Dow stocks to buy.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: The news article presents a positive outlook on Apple Inc. (AAPL) as one of the best Dow stocks to buy right now. It highlights the company's strong performance, with record revenue of $94.9 billion in Q4 2024, a 6% rise from the previous year. The article also mentions Apple's dominant position in the consumer electronics sector, its growing services sector, and its high-end ecosystem of goods, services, and software. These factors contribute to a positive sentiment around the stock. However, the article also mentions that the conviction for Apple's growth lies in its potential to keep up with AI-related advancements, but other AI stocks might hold greater promise. Based on this analysis, the probability of the stock price rising seems higher than falling, but the article does not provide overwhelmingly positive indicators that would significantly increase the stock price.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3, Reasoning: The article discusses Apple Inc. (AAPL) as one of the best Dow stocks to buy right now, highlighting its solid financial performance, dominance in the consumer electronics sector, and growth in its Services business segment. The company's record revenue and strong iPhone sales in the fourth quarter of 2024 are also mentioned. However, the article notes that AI stocks may hold greater promise for delivering higher returns, which might impact AAPL's growth potential. Considering the overall positive tone of the article and the current market trends, I estimate that the probability of the stock price rising is higher than falling.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: The financial news highlights Apple Inc.'s strong quarterly results and continued dominance in the consumer electronics sector. However, the article suggests a preference for AI stocks over AAPL based on the potential for higher returns in the short term. Despite this, AAPL is ranked fifth among the best Dow stocks to buy, suggesting it still holds significant appeal. The bullish trend in tech stocks and the overall positive economic outlook might support further gains.
